articles.author: Ashley Strickland, CNN
articles.title: NASA's next moon rocket gets final repairs ahead of mission launch - CNN
articles.description: The NASA Artemis I mega moon rocket will experience some tweaks before its next attempt at a crucial prelaunch test. The team will roll the 322-foot-tall Artemis I rocket stack back into the Vehicle Assembly Building at Kennedy Space Center on April 26.

articles.author: Ashley Strickland, CNN
articles.title: Russian cosmonauts to activate space station's new robotic arm - CNN
articles.description: Two Russian cosmonauts went on a spacewalk outside the International Space Station on Monday to active a new robotic arm.
